card.name: Skill Tree VRL
card.text: Whenever you develop a new skill, you may activate it. Otherwise, you may activate one of your developed skills during each of your turns as a sorcery.

card.name: Ancestral Guardianship
card.text: Target creature gains hexproof and indestructible until end of turn. Skill-up. (Add a point to your skill tree. If you develop a new skill this way, you may activate it.)

card.name: Old Anoria Outrider
card.text: During your turn, this creature has first strike. At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you skilled-up this turn, this creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Radiant Templar
card.text: Vigilance Whenever you attack, if you control a full party, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. (Your party consists of up to one of each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)

card.name: Vaelan Bladesworn
card.text: When this creature enters, create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying.

card.name: Glass Prison
card.text: Enchant creature When this enchantment enters, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature does not untap during its controller's untap step. When enchanted creature becomes the target of a spell, sacrifice this enchantment.

card.name: Scroll Peddler
card.text: When this creature enters, skill-up. (Add a point to your skill tree. If you develop a new skill this way, you may activate it.) Whenever you skill-up, create a tapped Treasure token. This ability only triggers once each turn.

card.name: Depths Prowler
card.text: Flash This creature can't be blocked.

card.name: Shockbreath Juvenile
card.text: Flying {2}{U}{U}: Monstrosity 2. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) When this creature becomes monstrous, tap up to two target creatures. Put a stun counter on each creature tapped this way.

card.name: Ravenous Direbat
card.text: Flying, lifelink This creature can't block. {2}{B}: Monstrosity 1. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes monstrous.)

card.name: Skulking Assassin
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, skill-up. (Add a point to your skill tree. If you develop a new skill this way, you may activate it.)

card.name: Bishop of High Anoria
card.text: Lifelink When this creature enters, you draw a card and lose 1 life.

card.name: Deadly Alliance
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one of each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.) Destroy target creature or planeswalker.

card.name: United Defense
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one of each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.) United Defense deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Veteran Shieldmage
card.text: Flash When this creature enters, up to one target creature or planeswalker you control phases out. (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)

card.name: Coin-Turner Mercenary
card.text: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) Reach Whenever one or more other creatures you control enter, this creature deals 1 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Vaelan Firemage
card.text: When this creature enters, skill-up. (Add a point to your skill tree. If you develop a new skill this way, you may activate it.) {R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Hellstone Outfitter
card.text: When this creature enters, create a colorless Equipment artifact token named Sword with "Equipped creature gets +1/+1" and equip {2}. Then attach it to this creature.

card.name: Wanderer of Old Anoria
card.text: {1}: Add one mana of any color. Activate this ability only once each turn. {5}{G}: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Anorian Blade-Guard
card.text: Trample Whenever you skill-up, you may pay {1}{G}. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. (Add a point to your skill tree. If you develop a new skill this way, you may activate it.)

card.name: Tower Wurm
card.text: Reach {4}{G}{G}: Monstrosity 4. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put four +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

card.name: Defeat the Dragon
card.text: Destroy up to one target creature with flying. Skill-up. (Add a point to your skill tree. If you develop a new skill this way, you may activate it.)

card.name: Mask of Hidden Identity
Voltite Automaton
card.text: {3}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a Treasure token. Draw a card.

card.name: Resonance Field
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Skill-up. Activate only as a sorcery. (Add a point to your skill tree. If you develop a new skill this way, you may activate it.)

card.name: Deviant Sentinel
card.text: When this creature dies, create a colorless Equipment artifact token named Sword with "Equipped creature gets +1/+1" and equip {2}.

card.name: Nightwalker Warpriest
card.text: Menace Whenever you discard one or more cards, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Emra's Torrent
card.text: Choose one — • Counter target creature spell. • Return target creature to its owner's hand. Then if you have developed each of the Mage skills, draw a card.

card.name: Sandtwister Barrier
card.text: This spell can't be countered if you have developed each of the Mage skills. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you and permanents you control this turn by sources you don't control. If damage is prevented this way, Sandtwister Barrier deals that much damage to target creature you don't control.

card.name: Titan of the Wild Ways
card.text: Reach, trample Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, skill-up. Then if you have developed each of the Tracker skills, return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. (Add a point to your skill tree. If you develop a new skill this way, you may activate it.)

card.name: Between the Old and New
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may cast that card by discarding a card in addition to its other costs.

card.name: Gather the Party
card.text: Look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal up to two Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and/or Wizard cards from among them. Put up to one of the revealed cards onto the battlefield and the other into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Erestes, Skelemancer
card.text: Flying When this creature enters and whenever you skill-up, you may exile a card from your graveyard. If you do, create a 1/1 black Skeleton creature token.

card.name: Haunting of Old Anoria
card.text: This creature enters tapped. When this creature enters, each opponent may skill-up. (They add a point to their skill tree. If they develop a new skill this way, they may activate it.) {B}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Return this creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Wizened Vizier
card.text: When this creature enters, skill-up. (Add a point to your skill tree. If you develop a new skill this way, you may activate it.) Whenever you skill-up, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. If this is the second time this ability has resolved this turn, draw a card.

card.name: Priestess of the First Book
card.text: Whenever you gain life, skill-up. (Add a point to your skill tree. If you develop a new skill this way, you may activate it.) {W}: This creature gains lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Purge Soul
card.text: Exile target creature. If it had mana value 2 or less, create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

card.name: Hulking Firesmith
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each skill you have developed. Trample Whenever this creature enters or attacks, create a colorless Equipment artifact token named Sword with "Equipped creature gets +1/+1" and equip {2}.

card.name: Frostweft Thief
card.text: Flash Whenever you cast a spell during an opponent's turn, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Plated Gorehoof
card.text: Trample Other creatures you control with +1/+1 counters on them have trample. {3}{G}{G}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

card.name: Burn with Hellstone
card.text: Destroy target creature. If you have a full party, Burn with Hellstone deals 3 damage to that creature's controller. (Your party consists of up to one of each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)

card.name: Frostgaze Griff
card.text: Flying Whenever you put one or more +1/+1 counters on a creature you control, tap target creature you don't control. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as you control this creature. {3}{G}{U}: Monstrosity 1.

card.name: Chains of Holy Fire
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, this enchantment deals 2 damage to that player.

card.name: Enriching Study
card.text: You gain 3 life. Draw a card. Skill-up. (Add a point to your skill tree. If you develop a new skill this way, you may activate it.)

card.name: Golden Champion
card.text: This creature is all colors. During your turn, this creature has double strike. At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you have developed each of the Fighter skills, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

card.name: Shocking Research
card.text: Draw two cards, then discard two cards. Shocking Research deals damage to target creature or planeswalker equal to the number of cards you discarded this turn.

card.name: Shapeshifter VRL
card.text: Changeling (This card is every creature type.)

card.name: Bird VRL
card.text: Flying

card.name: Treasure VRL
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Sword VRL
card.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+1. Equip {2}
